title: FS: T206 Joe Birmingham NICE. maybe trimmed, or miscut
author: GrayGhost

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Joe Birmingham NICE. maybe trimmed, or miscut
posts.post_content:
Well, dealer I got this from says its trimmed, or it may just be miscut. At WORST, its "Authentic". Pretty card no matter what. I haven't measured it, so am selling "as is and described"

  pretty good corners and colors. Has "Piedmont 150" Back. T206 popular horizontal card. MUCH nicer looking in person, than scan.

Looking for 27.00 incl shipping for this card. THANKS. PM if you want to reserve it. Scott

Ck/MO only on this. THANKS.
